functions.name: carWindows.set
functions.description: Set the state of a specific window (open or closed).

open.description: Set window to open (true) or closed (false).

functions.name: carWindows.toggle
functions.description: Toggle a specific window between open and closed states.

functions.name: carWindows.openAll
functions.description: Open all four windows simultaneously.

functions.name: carWindows.closeAll
functions.description: Close all four windows simultaneously.

functions.name: carWindows.get
functions.description: Get the current state of one or all windows.

id.description: Optional: specific window ID. Omit to get all windows.

functions.name: media.play
functions.description: Start media playback.

functions.name: media.pause
functions.description: Pause media playback.

functions.name: media.togglePlayPause
functions.description: Toggle between play and pause states.

functions.name: media.next
functions.description: Skip to the next track.

functions.name: media.previous
functions.description: Go back to the previous track.

functions.name: media.setTrack
functions.description: Jump to a specific track by index.

index.description: Track index (0-6 for the available tracks).

functions.name: media.get
functions.description: Get the current media player state including track info and playback status.

functions.name: climate.setTarget
functions.description: Set the target temperature for climate control.

functions.name: climate.setFan
functions.description: Set the fan speed level.

level.description: Fan level (1-4, where 1 is low and 4 is high).

functions.name: climate.increaseFan
functions.description: Increase the fan speed by 1 level.

functions.name: climate.decreaseFan
functions.description: Decrease the fan speed by 1 level.

functions.name: climate.get
functions.description: Get the current climate control state including temperatures and fan level.

functions.name: navigation.setDestination
functions.description: Set a navigation destination and generate a route.

destination.description: Optional: destination name. If omitted, a random destination is generated.

functions.name: navigation.start
functions.description: Start turn-by-turn navigation guidance.

functions.name: navigation.pause
functions.description: Pause navigation guidance.

functions.name: navigation.toggle
functions.description: Toggle navigation guidance between running and paused states.

functions.name: navigation.clear
functions.description: Clear the current route and destination.

functions.name: navigation.get
functions.description: Get the current navigation state including destination, route, and progress.

functions.name: audio.setVoice
functions.description: Set the voice for text-to-speech output.

voice.description: Voice selection for TTS: "US male", "US female", "UK male", or "UK female".

functions.name: audio.get
functions.description: Get the current audio assistant state including selected voice.

functions.name: system.getState
functions.description: Get the complete state of all cockpit subsystems (windows, media, climate, navigation, audio).
